data.title: List of Cup Winners
data.text:
Iraq - List of Cup Winners

Casuals Cup history (1923/24-1935/36)

Prince Ghazi Cup history (1931/32-1934/35)

Kas Al-Ittihad

1949 BPC (Basra) 2-1 Military Academy (Baghdad) NB: first ever nationwide competition; one-off event involving clubs from Baghdad, Basra, Kirkuk and Mosul

Iraqi FA Cup

NB: the tournament contested between 1956/57 and 1960/61 in knock-out format and also known as the Iraqi FA Cup Championship was in fact the championship of the Iraqi Central FA in Baghdad. 1972/73 Al-Tayaran 1973/74 Al-Tayaran 2-1 Sikak Al-Hadeed 1974/75 Al-Tayaran 1975/76 Al-Zawra 5-0 Baladiyat 1976/77 not held 1977/78 Al-Tayaran 1-1 Al-Shurta [aet, 5-3 pen] 1978/79 Al-Zawra 3-1 Al-Jaish 1979/80 Al-Jaish 1-1 Talaba [aet, 4-2 pen] 1980/81 Al-Zawra 1-0 Talaba 1981/82 Al-Zawra 2-1 Talaba 1982/83 Al-Jaish 2-1 Al-Shabab 1983/84 Al-Sena'a 0-0 Al-Shabab [aet, 5-4 pen] 1984/85 not finished 1985/86 not held 1986/87 Al-Rasheed 1-1 Al-Jaish [aet, 4-3 pen] 1987/88 Al-Rasheed 0-0 Al-Zawra [aet, 4-3 pen] 1988/89 Al-Zawra 3-0 Al-Tayaran 1989/90 Al-Zawra 0-0 Al-Shabab [aet, 2-1 pen] 1990/91 Al-Zawra 1-1 Al-Jaish [aet, 4-3 pen] 1991/92 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 2-1 Khutut 1992/93 Al-Zawra 2-1 Talaba 1993/94 Al-Zawra 2-1 Talaba 1994/95 Al-Zawra 3-0 Al-Jaish 1995/96 Al-Zawra 2-1 Al-Shurta 1996/97 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 1-1 Al-Shurta [aet, 8-7 pen] 1997/98 Al-Zawra 1-1 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia [aet, 4-3 pen] 1998/99 Al-Zawra 1-0 Talaba [asdet] 1999/00 Al-Zawra 0-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia [aet, 4-3 pen] 2000/01 not held 2001/02 Talaba 1-0 Al-Shurta 2002/03 Talaba 1-0 Al-Shurta 2003-12 not held 2012/13 abandoned 2013-15 not held 2015/16 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 2-0 Al-Zawra 2016/17 Al-Zawra 1-0 Nafit Al-Wasat 2017/18 not held 2018/19 Al-Zawra 1-0 Kahrabaa 2019/20 abandoned 2020/21 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 0-0 Al-Zawra [4-2 pen] 2021/22 Al-Karkh 2-1 Kahrabaa 2022/23 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 1-0 Arbil 2023/24 Al-Shurta 1-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia Total Number of Wins (37 known) 16 Al-Zawra (Baghdad) 10 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia (=Air Force) (Baghdad) [includes Al-Tayaran] 2 Al-Jaish (=Army) (Baghdad) Al-Rasheed (replaced by Al-Karkh in 1991) Talaba (=Students) 1 Al-Karkh Maslaha Naqil Al-Rakab (=Passenger Transport Department) Nadi Athori (=Assyrian Sports Club) Al-Sena'a (=Industry) Al-Shurta (=Police) (Baghdad) NB: Al-Tayaran (Airlines) was the name of Al-Quwa Al-Jawia from 1968 to 1991. Number of League-and-Cup Doubles (18) 8 Al-Zawra [1976, 1979, 1991, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1999, 2000] 6 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia [1973, 1974, 1975, 1992, 1997, 2021] [includes Al-Tayaran] 2 Al-Rasheed [1987, 1988] 1 Al-Shurta [2024] Talaba [2002]

Al-Muthabara Cup (Super Cup)

1997 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 3-1 Al-Zawra 1998 Al-Zawra 1-0 Al-Shurta 1999 Al-Zawra 2-2 Talaba [5-4 pen] 2000 Al-Zawra 1-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 2001 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 1-0 Al-Zawra 2002 Talaba 2-1 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia [aet] 2003-15 not held 2016 match between Al-Zawra (champions) and Al-Quwa Al-Jawia (cup winners) Aug 22 cancelled 2017 Al-Zawra 1-1 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia [3-0 pen] 2018 not held 2019 Al-Shurta 1-1 Al-Zawra [4-3 pen] 2020 not held 2021 Al-Zawra 1-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 2022 Al-Shurta 1-0 Al-Karkh

Umm Al-Maarak Cup (Mother of All Battles Cup)

Initiated in September 1991, following the Gulf War. Played between the top-6 sides of the league in the first edition, nowadays between the top-8. After the attack on Iraq in spring 2003, the tournament is called Baghdad Championship (presumably since all matches are played in Baghdad).

1991 Al-Zawra 3-1 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia [aet] 1992 Talaba 1-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia [aet] 1993 Talaba 2-1 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 1994 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 0-0 Talaba [aet, 4-3 pen] 1995 Talaba 1-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 1996 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 1-0 Al-Zawra 1997 Najaf 4-0 Al-Shurta 1998 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 3-0 Nafat 1999 Al-Zawra 2-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 2000 Al-Shurta 1-0 Al-Zawra 2001 Al-Shurta 1-0 Talaba [aet] [played 2002] 2002 Al-Shurta 1-0 Talaba Baghdad Championship 2003 Al-Zawra 2-2 Talaba [5-4 pen] Topscorers by edition: 1991 Laith Hussain (Zawra) 4 1992 Kareem Sadam (Zawra) 7 1993 Akrem Ammanueel (Q.Jawia) 3 1994 Sahib Abbas (Zawra) 6 1995 Muaid Judi (Talaba) 5 1996 Husam Fauzi (Zawra), Waleed Dahad (Q.Jawia), Mufeed Asim (Shurta) 4 1997 Mahmud Majeed (Shurta), Waleed Dahad (Q.Jawia), Salman Husain (Najaf) 4 1998 Akrem Ammanueel (Q.Jawia), Habib Jaafar (Talaba) 4 1999 Kahtan Chitheer (Karkh) 6 2000 Mahir Ukla, Ahmad Khudair (both Shurta), Sabah Ijair (Talaba) 3 2001 Yonis Mahmud (Talaba) 4 2002 Hishim Muhammad (Zawraa) 4 2003 Falah Hassan (Najaf) 3 All-time Table 1991-2002: Al-Zawraa 53 32 9 13 105- 50 105 Talaba 56 29 14 13 83- 68 101 Al-Quwa Al-Jawiya 54 27 8 19 82- 48 90 Al-Shurta 44 17 9 18 77- 78 60 Al-Karkh 35 10 10 15 42- 46 40 Najaf 35 10 10 15 40- 45 40 Al-Nafat 21 6 6 9 18- 27 24 Al-Minaa 14 4 3 7 13- 24 15 Al-Jaish 11 1 4 6 10- 20 7 Diyala 3 2 0 1 5- 5 6 Duhok 9 1 1 7 7- 21 4 Al-Defaa Al-Jawiya 3 1 0 2 5- 7 3 Arbil 3 1 0 2 4- 8 3 Mosul 3 0 1 2 3- 7 1 Ramadi 3 0 1 2 4- 10 1 Salah-Al-Deen 6 0 1 5 4- 19 1 Khutot 3 0 0 3 0- 3 0 Samarra 3 0 0 3 2- 10 0 All-time Topscorers 1991-2001: 18 Sahib Abbas (Talaba,Zawra) 15 Waleed Dahad (Q.Jawia) 11 Ahmad Khudair (Q.Jawia,Shurta), Abdul Wahab Abu-Alheel (Shurta,Talaba) 9 Akrem Ammanueel (Q.Jawia), Kareem Sadam (Zawra)

Various Other Cup Tournaments

Taha Al-Hashimi Cup 1938 Montakhab Al-Shurta 1-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 1939 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia Al-Quwa Al-Jawiya Cup 1939 Montakhab Al-Shurta 2-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 1940 not known 1941 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 1942 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia Al-Wasi Cup 1940 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia Amanat Al-Asima Cup 1941 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia Palestine Cup 1942 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia Al-Athar Cup [later called Al-Muthabara Cup] 1962 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia 4-2 Al-Kuliya Al-Askariya 1964 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia Al-Muthabara Cup [not related to Super Cup listed above] 1966 Al-Firqa Al-Thalata 1-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawiya 1986 Al Rasheed SC Republics Cup 1968 Al-Shurta SC 1969 Al-Shurta SC Chief of Police Cup 1972 Al-Shurta SC President's Gold Cup 1983 Al-Shurta SC Farewell League Cup 1986 Al-Tayaran 2-1 Al-Zawra'a Al-Nasr Al-Adheem Cup 1987 Al-Shurta SC 1988-95 not played 1996 Al-Shurta SC 1997-2000 not played Baghdad Challenge Cup 2001 Al-Talaba 2-1 Al-Zawra'a 2002-04 not played 2005 Al-Shurta SC 2-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawiya 2006-12 not played Baghdad Cup 2013 Al-Shurta SC 1-0 Al-Zawra'a 2014 not played 2015 Al-Zawra'a 0-0 Al-Quwa Al-Jawia [5-4 pen]

About this document

Sources included: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al-Quwa_Al-Jawiya and https://alshorta.webs.com/honours

Prepared and maintained by Refel Hashim, Hans Schöggl, Hassanin Mubarak and Mohammed Qayed for the Rec.Sport.Soccer Statistics Foundation

Authors: Refel Hashim (refel76@hotmail.com), Hans Schöggl, Hassanin Mubarak (Iraqifootball@yahoo.com) and Mohammed Qayed (mhqayed@hotmail.com)
